subject: Horse Racing
Kentucky Derby
lead_paragraph: Dodgers Manager Joe Torre, reintroduced to horse racing by Don Zimmer years ago, is a co-owner of Homeboykris, a long shot in Saturday’s Kentucky Derby.
snippet: Dodgers Manager Joe Torre, reintroduced to horse racing by Don Zimmer years ago, is a co-owner of Homeboykris, a long shot in Saturday’s Kentucky Derby.
